headline: Assessing Cadence Design Systems After AI Design Momentum and Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: If you are wondering whether Cadence Design Systems is still worth buying at around $313 a share, or if most of the upside is already baked in, you are not alone. That is exactly what we are going to unpack here. The stock is up 5.2% year to date and 4.4% over the last year, compared with a 93.5% gain over three years and 133.6% over five years. Against that backdrop, the recent 6.7% pullback in the last week and modest 3.2% rise over the last month look more like a breather than a broken...

headline: Should You Invest in Cadence (CDNS) Based on Bullish Wall Street Views?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Cadence (CDNS) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?
